summary.description:
charting functional regulatory maps in plants.

Plant Regulation Data and Analysis Platform.

PlantRegMap, a portal for the regulation data and analsyis tools in plants.

Plant Transcriptional Regulatory Map.

Transcriptional regulations in PlantRegMap are identified from literature and ChIP-seq data, or inferred by combining TF binding motifs and regulatory elements data (see methods for more details). Users can select one of the three modes to retrieve regulations according to your requirement: 1) “TF (retrieve targets)” to retrieve the downstream targets of input TFs, 2) “Target (retrieve TFs)” to retrieve the upstream regulators of input genes, and 3) “Gene (retrieve regulations among them)” to retrieve the inside regulations among input genes
summary.name: PlantRegMap
